purpose.summary: This COBOL copybook defines a data structure for a Pending Authorization Request record, consisting of level-05 fields for authorization date/time, card number, expiry date, transaction amount, merchant details, and transaction ID. It is designed for use in payment processing programs handling credit card or similar authorization requests. The header explicitly identifies it as 'PENDING AUTHORIZATION REQUEST' (lines 2,19-36).
purpose.business_context: Payment processing system for handling pending credit/debit card authorization requests from merchants or acquirers, including transaction and merchant validation data.

copybooks_used.purpose: Defines the complete data structure for Pending Authorization Request, including fields such as PA-RQ-AUTH-DATE (line 19), PA-RQ-CARD-NUM (line 21), PA-RQ-TRANSACTION-AMT (line 27), PA-RQ-MERCHANT-ID (line 31), and PA-RQ-TRANSACTION-ID (line 36), used to hold input/output data for authorization processing in calling COBOL programs.
